SA10bsa027_u:6: Mś_1.3 na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:7: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kkacana kecana //
SA10bsa027_u:10: Mś_1.5 na hi svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ pratyayādiṣu vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:12: Mś_1.6 kriyā na pratyayavatī nāpratyayavatī kriyā /
SA10bsa027_u:16: Mś_1.8 naivāsato naiva sataḥ pratyayo 'rthasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:17: asataḥ pratyayaḥ kasya sataśca pratyayena kim //
SA10bsa027_u:18: Mś_1.9 na sannāsanna sadasan dharmo nirvartate yadā /
SA10bsa027_u:19: kathaṃ nirvartako heturevaṃ sati hi yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:20: Mś_1.10 anālambana evāyaṃ san dharma upadiśyate /
SA10bsa027_u:24: Mś_1.12 bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvānāṃ na sattā vidyate yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:26: Mś_1.13 na ca vyastasamasteṣu pratyayeṣvasti tatphalam /
SA10bsa027_u:27: pratyayebhyaḥ kathaṃ tacca bhavenna pratyayeṣu yat //
SA10bsa027_u:36: Mś_2.1 gataṃ na gamyate tāvadagataṃ naiva gamyate /
SA10bsa027_u:38: Mś_2.2 ceṣṭā yatra gatistatra gamyamāne ca sā yataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:39: na gate nāgate ceṣṭā gamyamāne gatistataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:42: Mś_2.4 gamyamānasya gamanaṃ yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:45: yena tadgamyamānaṃ ca yaccātra gamanaṃ punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:46: Mś_2.6 dvau gantārau prasajyete prasakte gamanadvaye /
SA10bsa027_u:50: Mś_2.8 gantā na gacchati tāvadagantā naiva gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:54: Mś_2.10 pakṣo gantā gacchatīti yasya tasya prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:56: Mś_2.11 gamane dve prasajyete gantā yadyuta gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:57: ganteti cocyate yena gantā san yacca gacchati //
SA10bsa027_u:58: Mś_2.12 gate nārabhyate gantuṃ gataṃ nārabhyate 'gate /
SA10bsa027_u:60: Mś_2.13 na pūrvaṃ gamanārambhādgamyamānaṃ na vā gatam /
SA10bsa027_u:62: Mś_2.14 gataṃ kiṃ gamyamānaṃ kimagataṃ kiṃ vikalpyate /
SA10bsa027_u:64: Mś_2.15 gantā na tiṣṭhati tāvadagantā naiva tiṣṭhati /
SA10bsa027_u:70: Mś_2.18 yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eveti na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:71: anya eva punargantā gateriti na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:72: Mś_2.19 yadeva gamanaṃ gantā sa eva hi bhavedyadi /
SA10bsa027_u:73: ekībhāvaḥ prasajyeta kartuḥ karmaṇa eva ca //
SA10bsa027_u:74: Mś_2.20 anya eva punargantā gateryadi vikalpyate /
SA10bsa027_u:76: Mś_2.21 ekībhāvena vā siddhirnānābhāvena vā yayoḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:77: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:78: Mś_2.22 gatyā yayocyate gantā gatiṃ tāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:80: Mś_2.23 gatyā yayocyate gantā tato 'nyāṃ sa na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:82: Mś_2.24 sadbhūto gamanaṃ gantā triprakāraṃ na gacchati /
SA10bsa027_u:85: tasmādgatiśca gantā ca gantavyaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:88: Mś_3.1 darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:90: Mś_3.2 svamātmānaṃ darśanaṃ hi tattameva na paśyati /
SA10bsa027_u:91: na paśyati yadātmānaṃ kathaṃ drakṣyati tatparān //
SA10bsa027_u:94: Mś_3.4 nāpaśyamānaṃ bhavati yadā kiṃcana darśanam /
SA10bsa027_u:96: Mś_3.5 paśyati darśanaṃ naiva naiva paśyatyadarśanam /
SA10bsa027_u:98: Mś_3.6 tiraskṛtya draṣṭā nāstyatiraskṛtya ca darśanam /
SA10bsa027_u:99: draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ caiva draṣṭaryasati te kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:104: Mś_3.9 vyākhyātaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasanaṃ sparśanaṃ manaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:112: Mś_4.3 rūpeṇa tu vinirmuktaṃ yadi syādrūpakāraṇam /
SA10bsa027_u:113: akāryakaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt nāstyakāryaṃ ca kāraṇam //
SA10bsa027_u:114: Mś_4.4 rūpe satyeva rūpasya kāraṇaṃ nopapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:116: Mś_4.5 niṣkāraṇaṃ punā rūpaṃ naiva naivopapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:122: Mś_4.8 vigrahe yaḥ parīhāraṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:124: Mś_4.9 vyākhyāne ya upālambhaṃ kṛte śūnyatayā vadet /
SA10bsa027_u:130: Mś_5.2 alakṣaṇo na kaścicca bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kkacit /
SA10bsa027_u:136: Mś_5.5 tasmānna vidyate lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ naiva vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:138: Mś_5.6 avidyamāne bhāve ca kasyābhāvo bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:140: Mś_5.7 tasmānna bhāvo nābhāvo na lakṣyaṃ nāpi lakṣaṇam /
SA10bsa027_u:141: ākāśam ākāśasamā dhātavaḥ pañca ye pare //
SA10bsa027_u:142: Mś_5.8 astitvaṃ ye tu paśyanti nāstitvaṃ cālpabuddhayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:143: bhāvānāṃ te na paśyanti draṣṭavyopaśamaṃ śivam //
SA10bsa027_u:147: taṃ pratītya bhavedrāgo rakte rāgo bhavetsati //
SA10bsa027_u:148: Mś_6.2 rakte 'sati punā rāgaḥ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:149: sati vāsati vā rāge rakte 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:152: Mś_6.4 naikatve sahabhāvo 'sti na tenaiva hi tatsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:156: Mś_6.6 pṛthaktve sahabhāvaśca yadi kiṃ rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:158: Mś_6.7 siddhaḥ pṛthakpṛthagbhāvo yadi vā rāgaraktayoḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:160: Mś_6.8 pṛthaṅ na sidhyatītyevaṃ sahabhāvaṃ vikāṅkṣasi /
SA10bsa027_u:164: Mś_6.10 evaṃ raktena rāgasya siddhirna saha nāsaha /
SA10bsa027_u:168: Mś_7.1 yadi saṃskṛta utpādastatra yuktā trilakṣaṇī /
SA10bsa027_u:173: asti cedanavasthaivaṃ nāsti cette na saṃskṛtāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:176: Mś_7.5 utpādotpāda utpādo mūlotpādasya te yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:178: Mś_7.6 sa te maulena janito maulaṃ janayate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:184: Mś_7.9 pradīpe nāndhakāro 'sti yatra cāsau pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:185: kiṃ prakāśayati dīpaḥ prakāśo hi tamovadhaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:187: notpadyamāno hi tamaḥ pradīpaḥ prāpnute yadā //
SA10bsa027_u:188: Mś_7.11 aprāpyaiva pradīpena yadi vā nihataṃ tamaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:193: athotpanno janayate jāte kiṃ janyate punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:200: Mś_7.17 yadi kaścidanutpanno bhāvaḥ saṃvidyate kvacit /
SA10bsa027_u:201: utpadyeta sa kiṃ tasmin bhāva utpadyate 'sati //
SA10bsa027_u:215: tiṣṭhanti katame bhāvā ye jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:216: Mś_7.25 sthityānyayā sthiteḥ sthānaṃ tayaiva ca na yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:218: Mś_7.26 nirudhyate nāniruddhaṃ na niruddhaṃ nirudhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:222: Mś_7.28 tayaivāvasthayāvasthā na hi saiva nirudhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:228: Mś_7.31 asato 'pi na bhāvasya nirodha upapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:230: Mś_7.32 na svātmanā nirodho 'sti nirodho na parātmanā /
SA10bsa027_u:234: Mś_7.34 yathā māyā yathā svapno gandharvanagaraṃ yathā /
SA10bsa027_u:238: Mś_8.1 sadbhūtaḥ kārakaḥ karma sadbhūtaṃ na karotyayam /
SA10bsa027_u:240: Mś_8.2 sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti karma ca syādakartṛkam /
SA10bsa027_u:241: sadbhūtasya kriyā nāsti kartā ca syādakarmakaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:244: Mś_8.4 hetāvasati kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ ca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:245: tadabhāve kriyā kartā karaṇaṃ ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:247: dharme cāsatyadharme ca phalaṃ tajjaṃ na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:248: Mś_8.6 phale 'sati na mokṣāya na svargāyopapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:250: Mś_8.7 kārakaḥ sadasadbhūtaḥ sadasatkurute na tat /
SA10bsa027_u:252: Mś_8.8 satā ca kriyate nāsannāsatā kriyate ca sat /
SA10bsa027_u:253: kartrā sarve prasajyante doṣāstatra ta eva hi //
SA10bsa027_u:254: Mś_8.9 nāsadbhūtaṃ na sadbhūtaḥ sadasadbhūtameva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:258: Mś_8.11 karoti sadasadbhūto na sannāsacca kārakaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:260: Mś_8.12 pratītya kārakaḥ karma taṃ pratītya ca kārakam /
SA10bsa027_u:271: yaḥ prāgvyavasthito bhāvaḥ kena prajñapyate 'tha saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:272: Mś_9.4 vināpi darśanādīni yadi cāsau vyavasthitaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:273: amūnyapi bhaviṣyanti vinā tena na saṃśayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:276: Mś_9.6 sarvebhyo darśanādibhyaḥ kaścitpūrvo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:278: Mś_9.7 sarvebhyo darśanādibhyo yadi pūrvo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:280: Mś_9.8 draṣṭā sa eva sa śrotā sa eva yadi vedakaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:282: Mś_9.9 draṣṭānya eva śrotānyo vedako 'nyaḥ punaryadi /
SA10bsa027_u:283: sati syād draṣṭari śrotā bahutvaṃ cātmanāṃ bhavet //
SA10bsa027_u:287: na vidyate cedyasya sa na vidyanta imānyapi //
SA10bsa027_u:288: Mś_9.12 prāk ca yo darśanādibhyaḥ sāṃprataṃ cordhvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:300: Mś_10.5 anyo na prāpsyate 'prāpto na dhakṣyatyadahan punaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:303: strī saṃprāpnoti puruṣaṃ puruṣaśca striyaṃ yathā //
SA10bsa027_u:311: yadi yo 'pekṣitavyaḥ sa sidhyatāṃ kamapekṣya kaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:312: Mś_10.11 yo 'pekṣya sidhyate bhāvaḥ so 'siddho 'pekṣate katham /
SA10bsa027_u:322: Mś_10.16 ātmanaśca satattvaṃ ye bhāvānāṃ ca pṛthakpṛthak /
SA10bsa027_u:328: Mś_11.2 naivāgraṃ nāvaraṃ yasya tasya madhyaṃ kuto bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:334: Mś_11.5 na jarāmaraṇenaiva jātiśca saha yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:337: prapañcayanti tāṃ jātiṃ tajjarāmaraṇaṃ ca kim //
SA10bsa027_u:338: Mś_11.7 kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva lakṣyaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:339: vedanā vedakaścaiva santyarthā ye ca kecana //
SA10bsa027_u:340: Mś_11.8 pūrvā na vidyate koṭiḥ saṃsārasya na kevalam /
SA10bsa027_u:344: Mś_12.1 svayaṃ kṛtaṃ parakṛtaṃ dvābhyāṃ kṛtamahetukam /
SA10bsa027_u:345: duḥkhamityeka icchanti tacca kāryaṃ na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:346: Mś_12.2 svayaṃ kṛtaṃ yadi bhavetpratītya na tato bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:348: Mś_12.3 yadyamībhya ime 'nye syurebhyo vāmī pare yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:350: Mś_12.4 svapudnalakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi duḥkhaṃ punarvinā /
SA10bsa027_u:351: svapudgalaḥ sa katamo yena duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10bsa027_u:352: Mś_12.5 parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi yasmai pradīyate /
SA10bsa027_u:353: pareṇa kṛtvā tadduḥkhaṃ sa duḥkhena vinā kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:354: Mś_12.6 parapudgalajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadi kaḥ parapudgalaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:355: vinā duḥkhena yaḥ kṛtvā parasmai prahiṇoti tat //
SA10bsa027_u:357: paro hi duḥkhaṃ yatkuryāttattasya syātsvayaṃ kṛtam //
SA10bsa027_u:358: Mś_12.8 na tāvatsvakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ na hi tenaiva tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:360: Mś_12.9 syādubhābhyāṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ syādekaikakṛtaṃ yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:362: Mś_12.10 na kevalaṃ hi duḥkhasya cāturvidhyaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:367: sarve ca moṣadharmāṇaḥ saṃskārāstena te mṛṣā //
SA10bsa027_u:368: Mś_13.2 tanmṛṣā moṣadharma yadyadi kiṃ tatra muṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:371: asvabhāvo bhāvo nāsti bhāvānāṃ śūnyatā yataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:375: yuvā na jīryate yasmādyasmājjīrṇo na jīryate //
SA10bsa027_u:379: na kiṃcidastyaśūnyaṃ ca kutaḥ śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:380: Mś_13.8 śūnyatā sarvadṛṣṭīnāṃ proktā niḥsaraṇaṃ jinaiḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:384: Mś_14.1 draṣṭavyaṃ darśanaṃ draṣṭā trīṇyetāni dviśo dviśaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:386: Mś_14.2 evaṃ rāgaśca raktaśca rañjanīyaṃ ca dṛśyatām /
SA10bsa027_u:390: Mś_14.4 na ca kevalamanyatvaṃ draṣṭavyāderna vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:398: Mś_14.8 na tena tasya saṃsargo nānyenānyasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:399: saṃsṛjyamānaṃ saṃsṛṣṭaṃ saṃsraṣṭā ca na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:402: Mś_15.1 na saṃbhavaḥ svabhāvasya yuktaḥ pratyayahetubhiḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:404: Mś_15.2 svabhāvaḥ kṛtako nāma bhaviṣyati punaḥ katham /
SA10bsa027_u:405: akṛtrimaḥ svabhāvo hi nirapekṣaḥ paratra ca //
SA10bsa027_u:409: svabhāve parabhāve vā sati bhāvo hi sidhyati //
SA10bsa027_u:412: Mś_15.6 svabhāvaṃ parabhāvaṃ ca bhāvaṃ cābhāvameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:413: ye paśyanti na paśyanti te tattvaṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10bsa027_u:416: Mś_15.8 yadyastitvaṃ prakṛtyā syānna bhavedasya nāstitā /
SA10bsa027_u:422: Mś_15.11 asti yaddhi svabhāvena na tannāstīti śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:426: Mś_16.1 saṃskārāḥ saṃsaranti cenna nityāḥ saṃsaranti te /
SA10bsa027_u:427: saṃsaranti ca nānityāḥ sattve 'pyeṣa samaḥ kramaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:434: Mś_16.5 na badhyante na mucyante udayavyayadharmiṇaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:435: saṃskārāḥ pūrvavatsattvo badhyate na na mucyate //
SA10bsa027_u:436: Mś_16.6 bandhanaṃ cedupādānaṃ sopādāno na badhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:440: Mś_16.8 baddho na mucyate tāvadabaddho naiva mucyate /
SA10bsa027_u:445: yatra kastatra saṃsāro nirvāṇaṃ kiṃ vikalpyate //
SA10bsa027_u:448: Mś_17.1 ātmasaṃyamakaṃ cetaḥ parānugrāhakaṃ ca yat /
SA10bsa027_u:449: maitraṃ sa dharmastadbījaṃ phalasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10bsa027_u:450: Mś_17.2 cetanā cetayitvā ca karmoktaṃ paramarṣiṇā /
SA10bsa027_u:452: Mś_17.3 tatra yaccetanetyuktaṃ karma tanmānasaṃ smṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:457: cetanā ceti saptaite dharmāḥ karmāñjanāḥ smṛtāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:468: Mś_17.11 dharmasya sādhanopāyāḥ śuklāḥ karmapathā daśa /
SA10bsa027_u:469: phalaṃ kāmaguṇāḥ pañca dharmasya pretya ceha ca //
SA10bsa027_u:470: Mś_17.12 bahavaśca mahāntaśca doṣāḥ syurapi kalpanā /
SA10bsa027_u:472: Mś_17.13 imāṃ punaḥ pravakṣyāmi kalpanāṃ yātra yojyate /
SA10bsa027_u:476: Mś_17.15 prahāṇato na praheyo bhāvanāheya eva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:478: Mś_17.16 prahāṇataḥ praheyaḥ syātkarmaṇaḥ saṃkrameṇa vā /
SA10bsa027_u:480: Mś_17.17 sarveṣāṃ viṣabhāgānāṃ sabhāgānāṃ ca karmaṇām /
SA10bsa027_u:482: Mś_17.18 karmaṇaḥ karmaṇo dṛṣṭe dharma utpadyate tu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:485: anāsravaṃ sāsravaṃ ca vibhāgaṃ tatra lakṣayet //
SA10bsa027_u:486: Mś_17.20 śūnyatā ca na cocchedaḥ saṃsāraśca na śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:488: Mś_17.21 karma notpadyate kasmāt niḥsvabhāvaṃ yatastataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:491: akṛtaṃ ca bhavetkarma kriyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10bsa027_u:494: Mś_17.24 vyavahārā virudhyante sarva eva na saṃśayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:498: Mś_17.26 karma kleśātmakaṃ cedaṃ te ca kleśā na tattvataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:499: na cette tattvataḥ kleśāḥ karma syāttattvataḥ katham //
SA10bsa027_u:500: Mś_17.27 karma kleśāśca dehānāṃ pratyayāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:501: karma kleśāśca te śūnyā yadi deheṣu kā kathā //
SA10bsa027_u:503: sa bhoktā sa ca na karturanyo na ca sa eva saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:506: Mś_17.30 karma cennāsti kartā ca kutaḥ syātkarmajaṃ phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:507: asatyatha phale bhoktā kuta eva bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:509: nirmito nirmimītānyaṃ sa ca nirmitakaḥ punaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:510: Mś_17.32 tathā nirmitakākāraḥ kartā karma ca tatkṛtam /
SA10bsa027_u:512: Mś_17.33 kleśāḥ karmāṇi dehāśca kartāraśca phalāni ca /
SA10bsa027_u:518: Mś_18.2 ātmanyasati cātmīyaṃ kuta eva bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:520: Mś_18.3 nirmamo nirahaṃkāro yaśca so 'pi na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:521: nirmamaṃ nirahaṃkāraṃ yaḥ paśyati na paśyati //
SA10bsa027_u:530: Mś_18.8 sarvaṃ tathyaṃ na vā tathyaṃ tathyaṃ cātathyameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:534: Mś_18.10 pratītya yadyadbhavati na hi tāvattadeva tat /
SA10bsa027_u:546: Mś_19.3 anapekṣya punaḥ siddhirnātītaṃ vidyate tayoḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:550: Mś_19.5 nāsthito gṛhyate kālaḥ sthitaḥ kālo na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:552: Mś_19.6 bhāvaṃ pratītya kālaścetkālo bhāvādṛte kutaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:553: na ca kaścana bhāvo 'sti kutaḥ kālo bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:556: Mś_20.1 hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:557: phalamasti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10bsa027_u:558: Mś_20.2 hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryā jāyate yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:559: phalaṃ nāsti ca sāmagryāṃ sāmagryā jāyate katham //
SA10bsa027_u:560: Mś_20.3 hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāmasti cetphalam /
SA10bsa027_u:561: gṛhyeta nanu sāmagryāṃ sāmagryāṃ ca na gṛhyate //
SA10bsa027_u:562: Mś_20.4 hetośca pratyayānāṃ ca sāmagryāṃ nāsti cetphalam /
SA10bsa027_u:564: Mś_20.5 hetukaṃ phalasya datvā yadi heturnirudhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:566: Mś_20.6 hetuṃ phalasyādatvā ca yadi heturnirudhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:568: Mś_20.7 phalaṃ sahaiva sāmagryā yadi prādurbhavetpunaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:570: Mś_20.8 pūrvameva ca sāmagryāḥ phalaṃ prādurbhavedyadi /
SA10bsa027_u:572: Mś_20.9 niruddhe cetphalaṃ hetau hetoḥ saṃkramaṇaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:577: na hyadṛṣṭvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā heturjanayate phalam //
SA10bsa027_u:578: Mś_20.12 nātītasya hyatītena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:580: Mś_20.13 na jātasya hyajātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:582: Mś_20.14 nājātasya hi jātena phalasya saha hetunā /
SA10bsa027_u:584: Mś_20.15 asatyāṃ saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:585: satyāṃ vā saṃgatau hetuḥ kathaṃ janayate phalam //
SA10bsa027_u:586: Mś_20.16 hetuḥ phalena śūnyaścetkathaṃ janayate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:590: Mś_20.18 kathamutpatsyate śūnyaṃ kathaṃ śūnyaṃ nirotsyate /
SA10bsa027_u:592: Mś_20.19 hetoḥ phalasya caikatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:593: hetoḥ phalasya cānyatvaṃ na hi jātūpapadyate //
SA10bsa027_u:601: yā sāmagrī janayate sā kathaṃ janayetphalam //
SA10bsa027_u:602: Mś_20.24 na sāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalaṃ nāsāmagrīkṛtaṃ phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:603: asti pratyayasāmagrī kuta eva phalaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:606: Mś_21.1 vinā vā saha vā nāsti vibhavaḥ saṃbhavena vai /
SA10bsa027_u:607: vinā vā saha vā nāsti saṃbhavo vibhavena vai //
SA10bsa027_u:608: Mś_21.2 bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma vibhavaḥ saṃbhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:609: vinaiva janma maraṇaṃ vibhavo nodbhavaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:610: Mś_21.3 saṃbhavenaiva vibhavaḥ kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:611: na janmamaraṇaṃ caivaṃ tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:612: Mś_21.4 bhaviṣyati kathaṃ nāma saṃbhavo vibhavaṃ vinā /
SA10bsa027_u:613: anityatā hi bhāveṣu na kadācinna vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:614: Mś_21.5 saṃbhavo vibhavenaiva kathaṃ saha bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:615: na janmamaraṇaṃ caiva tulyakālaṃ hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:616: Mś_21.6 sahānyonyena vā siddhirvinānyonyena vā yayoḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:617: na vidyate, tayoḥ siddhiḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:618: Mś_21.7 kṣayasya saṃbhavo nāsti nākṣayasyāpi saṃbhavaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:619: kṣayasya vibhavo nāsti vibhavo nākṣayasya ca //
SA10bsa027_u:620: Mś_21.8 saṃbhavo vibhavaścaiva vinā bhāvaṃ na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:621: saṃbhavaṃ vibhavaṃ caiva vinā bhāvo na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:626: Mś_21.11 dṛśyate saṃbhavaścaiva vibhavaścaiva te bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:628: Mś_21.12 na bhāvājjāyate bhāvo bhāvo 'bhāvānna jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:630: Mś_21.13 na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:631: na svataḥ parataścaiva jāyate, jāyate kutaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:633: prasajyate sa bhāvo hi nityo 'nityo 'tha vā bhavet //
SA10bsa027_u:640: Mś_21.18 carame na niruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:641: carame nāniruddhe ca prathamo yujyate bhavaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:642: Mś_21.19 nirudhyamāne carame prathamo yadi jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:645: sārdhaṃ ca mriyate yeṣu teṣu skandheṣu jāyate //
SA10bsa027_u:646: Mś_21.21 evaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu na yuktā bhavasaṃtatiḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:647: triṣu kāleṣu yā nāsti sā kathaṃ bhavasaṃtatiḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:650: Mś_22.1 skandhā na nānyaḥ skandhebhyo nāsmin skandhā na teṣu saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:652: Mś_22.2 buddhaḥ skandhānupādāya yadi nāsti svabhāvataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:653: svabhāvataśca yo nāsti kutaḥ sa parabhāvataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:655: yaścānātmā sa ca kathaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:656: Mś_22.4 yadi nāsti svabhāvaśca parabhāvaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:664: Mś_22.8 tattvānyatvena yo nāsti mṛgyamāṇaśca pañcadhā /
SA10bsa027_u:670: Mś_22.11 śūnyamiti na vaktavyamaśūnyamiti vā bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:671: ubhayaṃ nobhayaṃ ceti prajñaptyarthaṃ tu kathyate //
SA10bsa027_u:674: Mś_22.13 yena grāho gṛhītastu ghano 'stīti tathāgataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:677: paraṃ nirodhādbhavati buddho na bhavatīti vā //
SA10bsa027_u:679: te prapañcahatāḥ sarve na paśyanti tathāgatam //
SA10bsa027_u:684: Mś_23.1 saṃkalpaprabhavo rāgo dveṣo mohaśca kathyate /
SA10bsa027_u:687: te svabhāvānna vidyante tasmāt kleśā na tattvataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:690: Mś_23.4 kasyaciddhi bhavantīme kleśāḥ sa ca na sidhyati /
SA10bsa027_u:691: kaścidāho vinā kaṃcitsanti kleśā na kasyacit //
SA10bsa027_u:692: Mś_23.5 svakāyadṛṣṭivat kleśāḥ kliṣṭe santi na pañcadhā /
SA10bsa027_u:697: vastu rāgasya dveṣasya mohasya ca vikalpyate //
SA10bsa027_u:700: Mś_23.9 aśubhaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāpi kutasteṣu bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:706: Mś_23.12 avidyamāne ca śubhe kuto rāgo bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:708: Mś_23.13 anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:709: nānityaṃ vidyate śūnye kuto grāho viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:710: Mś_23.14 anitye nityamityevaṃ yadi grāho viparyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:711: anityamityapi grāhaḥ śūnye kiṃ na viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:712: Mś_23.15 yena gṛṇhāti yo grāho grahītā yacca gṛhyate /
SA10bsa027_u:714: Mś_23.16 avidyamāne grāhe ca mithyā vā samyageva vā /
SA10bsa027_u:716: Mś_23.17 na cāpi viparītasya saṃbhavanti viparyayāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:720: Mś_23.19 anutpannāḥ kathaṃ nāma bhaviṣyanti viparyayāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:722: Mś_23.20 na svato jāyate bhāvaḥ parato naiva jāyate /
SA10bsa027_u:724: Mś_23.21 ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:725: ātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca na viparyayaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:726: Mś_23.22 nātmā ca śuci nityaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:727: anātmāśucyanityaṃ ca naiva duḥkhaṃ ca vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:730: Mś_23.24 yadi bhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10bsa027_u:731: kathaṃ nāma prahīyeran kaḥ svabhāvaṃ prahāsyati //
SA10bsa027_u:732: Mś_23.25 yadyabhūtāḥ svabhāvena kleśāḥ keciddhi kasyacit /
SA10bsa027_u:736: Mś_24.1 yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:738: Mś_24.2 parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca bhāvanā sākṣikarma ca /
SA10bsa027_u:741: phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:742: Mś_24.4 saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:744: Mś_24.5 dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:748: Mś_24.7 atra brūmaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ na tvaṃ vetsi prayojanam /
SA10bsa027_u:749: śūnyatāṃ śūnyatārthaṃ ca tata evaṃ vihanyase //
SA10bsa027_u:750: Mś_24.8 dve satye samupāśritya buddhānāṃ dharmadeśanā /
SA10bsa027_u:753: te tattvaṃ na vijānanti gambhīraṃ buddhaśāsane //
SA10bsa027_u:757: sarpo yathā durgṛhīto vidyā vā duṣprasādhitā //
SA10bsa027_u:758: Mś_24.12 ataśca pratyudāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ deśayituṃ muneḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:760: Mś_24.13 śūnyatāyāmadhilayaṃ yaṃ punaḥ kurute bhavān /
SA10bsa027_u:762: Mś_24.14 sarvaṃ ca yujyate tasya śūnyatā yasya yujyate /
SA10bsa027_u:763: sarvaṃ na yujyate tasya śūnyaṃ yasya na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:768: Mś_24.17 kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartāraṃ karaṇaṃ kriyām /
SA10bsa027_u:769: utpādaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca phalaṃ ca pratibādhase //
SA10bsa027_u:770: Mś_24.18 yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatāṃ tāṃ pracakṣmahe /
SA10bsa027_u:772: Mś_24.19 apratītya samutpanno dharmaḥ kaścinna vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:774: Mś_24.20 yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:776: Mś_24.21 apratītya samutpannaṃ kuto duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:777: anityamuktaṃ duḥkhaṃ hi tatsvābhāvye na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:778: Mś_24.22 svabhāvato vidyamānaṃ kiṃ punaḥ samudeṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:780: Mś_24.23 na nirodhaḥ svabhāvena sato duḥkhasya vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:782: Mś_24.24 svābhāvye sati mārgasya bhāvanā nopapadyate /
SA10bsa027_u:783: athāsau bhāvyate mārgaḥ svābhāvyaṃ te na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:784: Mś_24.25 yadā duḥkhaṃ samudayo nirodhaśca na vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:786: Mś_24.26 svabhāvenāparijñānaṃ yadi tasya punaḥ katham /
SA10bsa027_u:792: Mś_24.29 phalābhāve phalasthā no na santi pratipannakāḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:793: saṃgho nāsti na cetsanti te 'ṣṭau puruṣapudgalāḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:795: dharme cāsati saṃghe ca kathaṃ buddho bhaviṣyati //
SA10bsa027_u:796: Mś_24.31 apratītyāpi bodhiṃ ca tava buddhaḥ prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:797: apratītyāpi buddhaṃ ca tava bodhiḥ prasajyate //
SA10bsa027_u:798: Mś_24.32 yaścābuddhaḥ svabhāvena sa bodhāya ghaṭannapi /
SA10bsa027_u:800: Mś_24.33 na ca dharmamadharmaṃ vā kaścijjātu kariṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:801: kimaśūnyasya kartavyaṃ svabhāvaḥ kriyate na hi //
SA10bsa027_u:802: Mś_24.34 vinā dharmamadharmaṃ ca phalaṃ hi tava vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:803: dharmādharmanimittaṃ ca phalaṃ tava na vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:804: Mś_24.35 dharmādharmanimittaṃ vā yadi te vidyate phalam /
SA10bsa027_u:810: Mś_24.38 ajātamaniruddhaṃ ca kūṭasthaṃ ca bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:814: Mś_24.40 yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyatīdaṃ sa paśyati /
SA10bsa027_u:815: duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ caiva nirodhaṃ mārgameva ca //
SA10bsa027_u:818: Mś_25.1 yadi śūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:820: Mś_25.2 yadyaśūnyamidaṃ sarvamudayo nāsti na vyayaḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:825: prasajyetāsti bhāvo hi na jarāmaraṇaṃ vinā //
SA10bsa027_u:826: Mś_25.5 bhāvaśca yadi nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:827: nāsaṃskṛto hi vidyate bhāvaḥ kvacana kaścana //
SA10bsa027_u:829: nirvāṇaṃ nānupādāya kaścid bhāvo hi vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:830: Mś_25.7 yadi bhāvo na nirvāṇamabhāvaḥ kiṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA10bsa027_u:831: nirvāṇaṃ yatra bhāvo na nābhāvastatra vidyate //
SA10bsa027_u:834: Mś_25.9 ya ājavaṃjavībhāva upādāya pratītya va /
SA10bsa027_u:836: Mś_25.10 prahāṇaṃ cābravīcchāstā bhavasya vibhavasya ca /
SA10bsa027_u:843: asaṃskṛtaṃ ca nirvāṇaṃ bhāvābhāvau ca saṃskṛtau //
SA10bsa027_u:844: Mś_25.14 bhavedabhāvo bhāvaśca nirvāṇe ubhayaṃ katham /
SA10bsa027_u:846: Mś_25.15 naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇamiti yāñjanā /
SA10bsa027_u:847: abhāve caiva bhāve ca sā siddhe sati sidhyati //
SA10bsa027_u:848: Mś_25.16 naivābhāvo naiva bhāvo nirvāṇaṃ yadi vidyate /
SA10bsa027_u:849: naivābhāvo naiva bhāva iti kena tadajyate //
SA10bsa027_u:851: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate //
SA10bsa027_u:853: na bhavatyubhayaṃ ceti nobhayaṃ ceti nohyate //
SA10bsa027_u:856: Mś_25.20 nirvāṇasya ca yā koṭiḥ koṭiḥ saṃsaraṇasya ca /
SA10bsa027_u:862: Mś_25.23 kiṃ tadeva kimanyatkiṃ śāśvataṃ kimaśāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:863: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca kiṃ vā nobhayamapyataḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:874: Mś_26.4 cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca samanvāhārameva ca /
SA10bsa027_u:878: Mś_26.6 vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā vedanārthaṃ hi tṛṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:880: Mś_26.7 upādāne sati bhava upādātuḥ pravartate /
SA10bsa027_u:882: Mś_26.8 pañca skandhāḥ sa ca bhavaḥ bhavājjātiḥ pravartate /
SA10bsa027_u:899: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu sa eva na bhavatyayam //
SA10bsa027_u:900: Mś_27.4 sa evātmeti tu bhavedupādānaṃ viśiṣyate /
SA10bsa027_u:904: Mś_27.6 na copādānamevātmā vyeti tatsamudeti ca /
SA10bsa027_u:907: gṛhyate hyanupādāno yadyanyo na ca gṛhyate //
SA10bsa027_u:908: Mś_27.8 evaṃ nānya upādānānna copādānameva saḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:911: yo hi janmasu pūrveṣu tato 'nyo na bhavatyayam //
SA10bsa027_u:912: Mś_27.10 yadi hyayaṃ bhavedanyaḥ pratyākhyāyāpi taṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:913: tathaiva ca sa saṃtiṣṭhettatra jāyeta vāmṛtaḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:916: Mś_27.12 nāpyabhūtvā samudbhūto doṣo hyatra prasajyate /
SA10bsa027_u:920: Mś_27.14 adhvanyanāgate kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmīti darśanam /
SA10bsa027_u:922: Mś_27.15 sa devaḥ sa manuṣyaścedevaṃ bhavati śāśvatam /
SA10bsa027_u:923: anutpannaśca devaḥ syājjāyate na hi śāśvatam //
SA10bsa027_u:927: aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca bhavetacca na yujyate //
SA10bsa027_u:928: Mś_27.18 aśāśvataṃ śāśvataṃ ca prasiddhamubhayaṃ yadi /
SA10bsa027_u:931: yadi tasmādanādistu saṃsāraḥ syānna cāsti saḥ //
SA10bsa027_u:932: Mś_27.20 nāsti cecchāśvataḥ kaścit ko bhaviṣyatyaśāśvataḥ /
SA10bsa027_u:934: Mś_27.21 antavān yadi lokaḥ syātparalokaḥ kathaṃ bhavet /
SA10bsa027_u:938: Mś_27.23 pūrve yadi ca bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī /
SA10bsa027_u:940: Mś_27.24 pūrve yadi na bhajyerannutpadyeranna cāpyamī /
SA10bsa027_u:945: na naṅkṣyate caikadeśa evaṃ caitanna yujyate //
